@Exported

Package jdk.management.cmm

This package contains the interfaces for the Cooperative Memory Management ("CMM") feature.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SystemResourcePressureMXBean
    When using Cooperative Memory Management, the SystemResourcePressureMXBean serves to communicate memory pressure to the VM.

Package jdk.management.cmm Description

This package contains the interfaces for the Cooperative Memory Management ("CMM") feature. Cooperative memory management allows the level of pressure on system resources to be communicated to the Java VM. The VM (and applications) can then react, based on the level of pressure.
Since:
8u40
